name: Ice Nine Kills
description:
'''Ice Nine Kills''' is an American [[Heavy metal music|metal]] band from [[Boston]], Massachusetts. The band's music is primarily described as [[Horror film|horror]]-themed [[metalcore]], but incorporates many other musical styles. It was originally a [[ska punk]] band called Ice Nine, formed in 2000 by high school friends Spencer Charnas and Jeremy Schwartz, before adopting a metalcore style in 2010. Charnas is currently the only remaining founding member. The band is signed to [[Fearless Records]].

Ice Nine Kills has released three EPs along with six full-length studio albums: ''[[Last Chance to Make Amends]]'', ''[[Safe Is Just a Shadow]]'', ''[[The Predator Becomes the Prey]]'', ''[[Every Trick in the Book]]'', which peaked at number 122 on the US [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]]; ''[[The Silver Scream]]'', which peaked at number 29; and their latest, ''[[The Silver Scream 2: Welcome to Horrorwood]]'' which peaked at number 18. Their band name is derived from the fictional substance [[ice-nine]] from the 1963 novel ''[[Cat's Cradle]]'' by [[Kurt Vonnegut]].
